name: Cynefin Domain Classification
purpose: Determine problem type for assessment method selection

name: Feasibility Question Decomposition
purpose: Break monolithic question into assessable sub-questions

name: Feasibility Scope Definition
purpose: Define what is and is not being assessed

name: Constraint Hardness Spectrum
purpose: Classify constraints from impossible to inconvenient (H0-H5)

name: Requisite Variety Audit
purpose: Check if team variety matches problem complexity (Ashby)

name: TRIZ Contradiction Detection
purpose: Find technical and physical contradictions in requirements

name: Conway Alignment Check
purpose: Assess org structure vs required architecture alignment

name: Regulatory Feasibility Scan
purpose: Determine if project is legally permitted

name: Precedent Existence Check
purpose: Search for similar projects that have been done before

name: Technical Feasibility (TRL)
purpose: Assess technology readiness and scale validation

name: Resource Feasibility
purpose: Assess people budget infrastructure tools availability

name: Knowledge Feasibility
purpose: Assess if team knows HOW to do this

name: Organizational Feasibility
purpose: Assess if org can execute (structure process culture)

name: Temporal Feasibility
purpose: Assess critical path vs deadline

name: Compositional Feasibility
purpose: Assess if parts work together as system

name: Economic Feasibility
purpose: Assess if worth doing (costs vs benefits)

name: Scale Feasibility
purpose: Assess demo-to-production gap

name: Cognitive Feasibility
purpose: Assess if team can understand what they are building

name: Dependency Feasibility
purpose: Assess external dependency availability and reliability

name: Reference Class Forecasting
purpose: Use external base rates instead of internal estimates

name: Critical Assumption Testing
purpose: Empirically test key feasibility assumptions

name: Probe Design
purpose: Design safe-to-fail experiments for Complex domains

name: Expert Judgment Calibration
purpose: Gather and debias expert estimates

name: Analogical Feasibility Transfer
purpose: Assess how well precedent transfers to current situation

name: Integration Spike
purpose: Build and test hardest integration point first

name: Multi-Axis Feasibility Profile
purpose: Aggregate 10 dimensions into visual profile

name: Confidence-Weighted Decision
purpose: Combine score with confidence for decision

name: Conditional Feasibility Map
purpose: Map all feasibility conditions (feasible IF)

name: Feasibility Decay Monitoring
purpose: Design triggers for reassessment

name: Planning Fallacy Detection
purpose: Check for systematic optimism signals

name: Hofstadter Correction
purpose: Apply recursive estimation adjustment

name: Confidence Theater Detection
purpose: Distinguish genuine from performed confidence

name: Dunning-Kruger Dimension Map
purpose: Identify low expertise high confidence zones

name: Meta-Feasibility Check
purpose: Assess if feasibility assessment itself is feasible
